review: So far so good. Bought this to replace an Apple TV (old version) that was giving me fits . Love the ease of setting up and finding all the network hook-ups itself. Just a nice experience.  Still having withdrawal from all that the Apple TV could do, but haven't had time to explore this new unit enough to find where they hid all the options/functions. Would give it 5 stars if they actually made it easy to find ALL the options on a single start-up screen like Apple. Hate having to go to multiple screens to get to where what I want.

review: Good: Fire TV box is good and responsive. Many apps are there.The BAD :- I purchased it and connected to TV. Worked well and within one week, remote stopped working. I never did that.I contacted  Help center to cancel that digital order. First 2 times, help center responded that refund was already processed and asked me to follow up with bank. I verified my bank statement and it had no refund. So I asked transaction ID for the refund.  and then only help desk found that refund was not processed. They are now checking with  finance dept.

review: I returned mine and went back to Roku 3. I was actually surprised that from a processing speed standpoint the Roku 3 outperformed the Fire TV.
